scripts.dev:NodeDialog: concurrently -n server,app -c yellow,blue "http-server -c-1 --cors -p 3333 dist/ http-server" "npm run build:NodeDialog -- --watch"
scripts.dev:NodeDialog:standalone: concurrently -n server,app -c yellow,blue "http-server -c-1 --cors -p 4000 dist http-server" "NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider vue-cli-service serve src/dev/index.js"
scripts.dev:TableView: concurrently -n server,app -c yellow,blue "http-server -c-1 --cors -p 4000 dist/ http-server" "npm run build:TableView -- --watch"
scripts.dev:Statistics: concurrently -n server,app -c yellow,blue "http-server -c-1 --cors -p 4000 dist/ http-server" "npm run build:Statistics -- --watch"
scripts.build: npm run cleanDist && npm run build:NodeDialog && npm run build:TableView && npm run build:Statistics
scripts.build:NodeDialog: NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider vue-cli-service build --no-clean --target lib --formats umd-min --name DefaultNodeDialog --filename NodeDialog src/components/NodeDialog.vue
scripts.build:TableView: NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider vue-cli-service build --no-clean --target lib --formats umd-min --name "view_org.knime.base.views.node.tableview.TableViewNodeFactory" --filename TableView src/components/TableView.vue
scripts.build:Statistics: NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider vue-cli-service build --no-clean --target lib --formats umd-min --name "view_org.knime.base.views.node.statistics.StatisticsNodeFactory" --filename StatisticsView src/components/TableView.vue
scripts.jenkins:lint: eslint --ext .js,.vue,.json -f json -o target/eslint.json || true; stylelint '**/*.{css,vue}' -f json -o target/stylelint.json || true
